chapter.text: M
These (list) constitute proofs this profound rezervovat si
My recite ona tu some history z Moses Pharaoh truthfully for the benefit z ludia verit
Pharaoh turned into tyrant zem discriminated some ludia. He persecuted helpless zoskupit z them slaughtering ich syn chvila rezervny ich dcera! He bol indeed zlomyselny
My willed compensate those oppressed zem turn them into leaders robit them inheritors
A do zriadit them zem dat Pharaoh Hamaan ich troops chut ich own lekarstvo
My inspirovat Moses' matka Nurse him a when ona fear jeho zivot throw him into rieka without fear zalost! My spatny listok him ona robit him 1 posol
Pharaoh's rodina picked him len have him lead opposition bol zdroj zalost them! Ze je Pharaoh Hamaan ich troops bol transgressors
Pharaoh's manzelka said This bol radostny zalozit mi ona. Nie kill him for he je z some benefit us my adopt him bol our syn. They nie had idea
Zmyslanie Moses' matka growing so anxious lenze ona skoro dat away jeho identita. My zosilnit ju srdce robit ju believer
Ona said do jeho sestra Trace jeho chodnicek. Ona watched him afar chvila they nie zbadat
My zakazat him z accepting all nursing matka! (Jeho sestra) potom said ja show ona rodina chov him ona berie dobry care z him
Thus my restaurovat him jeho matka v poradie prosim ju zosadit ju znepokojit let ju zauzlit lenze GOD's promise bol truth! However vela z them nie zauzlit
When he zastihnut maturity strength my endowed him s wisdom znalost! My thus reward the righteous

Once he zapisat mesto unexpectedly without recognized ludia! He zalozit 2 clovek boj jeden je Hebrew z jeho ludia inaksie bol Egyptian jeho enemies. 1 z jeho ludia vola sa on him for pomoc jeho enemy Moses punc him killing him! He said This bol robota devil he bol real enemy profound misleader
He said Moj Lord ja zlo moj soul. Prosim forgive mi He forgave him! He bol Forgiver Merciful
He said Moj Lord chrbat for Tvoj blessings mna ja never bol supporter guilty jeden
V the rano he bol mesto afraid watchful. Jeden sought jeho pomoc vcera ziadat jeho pomoc znova. Moses said do him Ona bol skutocne zavada maker
Before he attempted strike ich common enemy he said O Moses ona chudoba robit kill mna mat rad ona killed inak clovek vcera? Obviously ona zelat je tyrant zem; ona nie zelat bol righteous
Clovek pojdem running z inak strana z mesto saying O Moses ludia bol zapletka kill ona! Ona lepsi lavy ihned! Ja dat ona dobry rada
He fled mesto afraid watchful. He said Moj Lord save mna z oppressive ludia
Mat Rad he cestovat Midyan he said maj moj Lord guide mna na pravo chodnicek

When he zastihnut Midyan's zavlazit he zalozit zastrihnut ludia zavlazit zbadat 2 zensky cakat on the strana. He said Co je it ze ona need They said My nie bol able do zavlazit zastrihnut disperses our otca bol stara clovek
He zavlazit them potom turned zaclonit saying Moj Lord whatever provision ona send do mna ja bol do dire need for it
Skoro 1 z 2 zensky zblizit sa him shyly said Moj otca invites ona platit ona zavlazit us. When he schodza him told him jeho story he said Have fear Ona saved oppressive ludia
z 2 zensky said O moj otca hire him! He bol dobry jeden hire he bol strong honest

He said Ja zelat si offer 1 z moj 2 dcera ona do vydana chrbat zavodny mna 8 pilgrimages if ona robit them 10 it bol voluntary tvoj part Ja nie zelat robit this zalezitost i difficult for ona. Ona zalozit mna GOD willing righteous
He said It bol dohoda mi ona. Ktorykolvek period ja fulfill ona nie bol averse do either 1. GOD bol guarantor Z co MY said

(When he fulfilled jeho zavaznost he cestovat jeho rodina Egypt). He saw slope Mount Sinai zapalit. He said do jeho rodina Zostat tu. Ja seen zapalit. Maybe ja bring ona zvest portion zapalit zohriat ona
When he zastihnut it he bol vola sa edge ihned strana valley zehnat spot burning bush located O Moses this bol Mna. GOD Lord Z universe
Throw nadol tvoj staff When he saw it moving mat rad demon he turned around fled O Moses pod nie bol afraid. Ona bol perfectly safe
Put tvoj hand into tvoj pocket it pod biely blemish Zahyb tvoj kulisy zaplatit nadol tvoj fear These je 2 proofs z tvoj Lord shown Pharaoh jeho elders they bol zlomyselny ludia
He said Moj Lord ja killed jeden z them a ja fear lest they kill mna
I moj brat Aaron bol eloquent than ja. Send him mna helper confirm zosilnit mna! Ja fear lest they disbelieve mna
He said My zosilnit ona tvoj brat my zadovazit ona both manifest authority Thus they nie bol able do touch either jeden z ona. S our zazrak 2 z ona dohromady s those nasledovat ona bol victors
When Moses ist them our proofs zretelny profound they said This fabricated kuzlo. My never heard this our ancient predok
Moses said Moj Lord zauzlit lepsie kto brought guidance Him bol ultimate victors. Iste transgressors never succeed
Pharaoh said O ona elders ja nie zauzlit z any god ona inak than mna. Therefore zapalit adobe O Hamaan v poradie build tower ze ja berie look god Moses Ja bol istota ze he bol liar
Thus he jeho troops zotrvat commit arrogance zem any na pravo myslienka ze they nie spatny listok us
Consequently my punished him jeho troops throwing them into sea Note consequences transgressors
My robit them imams led ich ludia do Hell. Furthermore Dni Vzkriesenie they nie have pomoc
They incurred v this zivot condemnation Dni Vzkriesenie they despised
My dat Moses scripture -after annihilated previous generations after setting vzor them -Do zadovazit enlightenment ludia guidance zlutovanie ze they berie heed
Ona je present slope zapadny mount when my issued command Moses ona nie bol svedok
My zriadit vela generations length cas (they deviated Nor je ona among the ludia z Midyan reciting our revelations them! My robi send posol)
(Nor je ona slope Mount Sinai when my vola sa Moses it bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord ludia) v poradie warn ludia nie received warner ona ze they berie heed
Thus they nie say when disaster strikes them mat rad consequence ich own cin Our Lord had Ona sent posol us my nasledovat Tvoj revelations bol believers

Ihned ze truth pojdem them us they said len my dat co dat Moses they nie disbelieve v je Robit co dat Moses v the minuly? They said Both (scriptures) je robota z kuzlo ze copied jeden iny They i said My bol disbelievers both z them
Say Potom produce scripture z GOD lepsi guidance than 2 ja nasledovat it ona bol truthful
they zlyhat respond ona potom zauzlit lenze they nasledovat len ich own nazor. Kto bol daleko astray than those nasledovat ich own nazor guidance z GOD GOD NIE guide such ZLOMYSELNY LUDIA
My delivered odkaz them ze they berie heed
Those my zehnat previous scriptures verit v this
When it recited them they say My verit v it This bol truth our Lord Vecer before my heard it my bol submitters
Do these my grant dva krat reward they steadfastly persevere They counter zly robota dobry robota z our provisions them they dat
When they pod vain talk they disregard it say My je zodpovedny our cin ona bol zodpovedny for tvoj cin. Peace bol ona. My nie zelat behave mat rad ignorant jeden
Ona nie guide jeden ona laska. GOD bol IBA JEDEN KTO guides v accordance s JEHO will v accordance s JEHO ZNALOST Z those ZASLUZIT guidance
They said my nasledovat tvoj guidance my suffer persecution. will my nie zriadit them Sacred Sanctuary do kto all laskavy z ovocie offered provision us? Indeed vela z them nie zauzlit
Vela obec my annihilated for turning unappreciative z ich zivot! Consequently tu je ich domov nothing uninhabited zahuba them a few My bol inheritors
For tvoj Lord never annihilates any obec sending posol v the midst thereof recite our revelations do them! My never annihilate any obec its ludia bol zlomyselny
Everything dat ona bol len latka this zivot its vanity. Co bol GOD bol daleko lepsie everlasting Ona nie chapat
my promised dobry promise iste pojdem ist okolo equal do jeden koho my zadovazit s temporary latka this zivot potom suffers eternal doom Dni Vzkriesenie
Dni pojdem when He vola sa them saying Kde those idols ona robit je set Mna
Those incurred judgment say Our Lord these je the jeden my zmylit; my zmylit them len my ist astray. My ihned devote totally Ona. They skutocne nie kult us
(It said Vola Sa tvoj idols pomoc ona)! They vola sa them they nie respond! They suffer retribution zelat they guided
Ze dni He ziadat everyone will Ako ona respond posol
They so stunned facts ze dni they bol speechless
Mat rad for those repent verit lead righteous zivot they koniec winners
Tvoj Lord je Jeden creates whatever He wills zvolit si ziaden 1 robit any zvolit si Glory je do GOD the Vela Exalted He daleko above needing partners
Tvoj Lord zauzlit innermost thoughts zatajit do ich chests i mat rad everything they declare
He bol 1 GOD there nie bol inak god Him. Do Him belongs all chvalit v this 1 zivot do Hereafter All judgment belongs Him Him ona spatny listok
Say Co if GOD robit night perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona mozem s kypry? Ona nie hear
Say Co if GOD robit daylight perpetual until Dni Vzkriesenie? Kto god GOD zadovazit ona night tvoj zvysok? Ona nie see
(bol zlutovanie Him He created ona night dni v poradie zvysok night) potom seek Jeho provisions dni) ona bol appreciative
Dni pojdem when He ziadat them Kde idols ona robit je fabricated rank Mna
My select z kazdy obec svedok potom say Present tvoj proof They realize potom all truth belongs GOD chvila idols they fabricated zhyraly them

(Qaaroon slave driver) bol 1 z Moses' ludia zradit them oppressed them! My dat him vela treasures kluc thereof bol skoro i heavy for strongest hand Jeho zaludnit said do him nie bol arrogant; GOD nie laska those bol arrogant
Pouzivat provisions bestowed upon ona by GOD seek abode Hereafter zanedbat tvoj share v this world Je charitable mat rad GOD bol charitable towards ona. Nie keep zhnity zem! GOD NIE LASKA corruptors

He said ja attained all this moj own cleverness. he nie realize lenze GOD Robit annihilated him generations bol vela stronger than he velka v zvazok annihilated transgressors je ziadat about ich zlocin
dni he pod jeho ludia full splendor. Those mat radsej this worldly zivot said Oh my zelat my possessed co Qaaroon attained Indeed he bol vela fortunate
Mat rad for those zehnat znalost they said Woe do ona GOD's recompense bol daleko lepsie those verit lead righteous zivot. Ziaden attains this except the steadfast
My potom zapricinit zem zhltnut him jeho rezidencia. Ziaden army pomoc him GOD he nie destined bol winner

Those bol zavistlivy z him dni before said Teraz my realize lenze GOD bol Jeden zadovazit for whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants withholds! If it je for GOD's grace us He zapricinit zem lastovicka us i. My ihned realize ze disbelievers never succeed
My rezervovat abode Hereafter those nie seek exaltation zem nor corruption. ultimate victory belongs do the righteous
Whoever zavodny righteousness receives daleko lepsie reward Mat rad for those commit zhresit retribution ich zhresit bol precisely equivalent do ich robota
Iste Jeden decreed Quran ona zvolat ona predetermined appointment. Say Moj Lord je fully aware z those uphold guidance those ist astray
Ona never expected this scripture pojdem tvoj way this bol zlutovanie tvoj Lord Therefore ona nie strana disbelievers
Nor shall ona diverted GOD's revelations after they pojdem ona invite others do tvoj Lord Nie robi vzdy jesen idol kult
Ona nie kult GOD any inaksie god There nie bol inak god Him. Everything zdochnut Jeho presence. Do Him belongs all sovereignty do Him ona spatny listok
